item.title: How to Make a Subnetting Cheat Sheet
item.description: How to Make a Subnetting Cheat Sheet First, write out the decimal representation of each bit of a single 8bit byte. 128 64 32 16 8 4 2 1 Next, we want to subtract the bit decimal value from 256. 256 256 256 256 256 256 256 256 -128 -64 -32 -16 -8 -4 -2 -1 128 192 224 240 248 252 254 255 This gives us our “magic number,” as some people call it, as well as the remaining bits of our network from the default subnet mask.
